name: Dimension Invader
description:
Submision for #CommunityGameJam

Be the Lone, silent special force soldier.
Follow orders.
Kill the invaders.

Game features:
- Two endings
- Top down shooting action
- Two levels filled with enemies
- Storyline! (so you'll have excuse to kill everyone!)

Tools used:
Godot - engine
Rytmik Ultimate - music
Bfxr - sounds
Paint.net - graphics
imgonline - seamless textures generator
icoconvert - game icon
